name: QR Code Reader
summary: QR code extension with server-controlled remote message/notification system that can display arbitrary HTML content to users. Sends user URLs to unknown third-party shortening services (hybridapps.net, amazonspot.net) without disclosure. Messages filtered to display only between 7am-10pm (evasion-like timing). Hardcoded secp256k1 private key and API token in client code. Optional online QR decode uploads tab screenshots to qrcd.org.

vulnerabilities.title: Remote Message/Notification System
vulnerabilities.description: Fetches unsigned JSON from dsnetx.web.app and dsnet.bitbucket.io to display arbitrary notifications/HTML content. Can target by extension version. Messages only shown between hours 7-22.

vulnerabilities.title: Undisclosed URL Data Transmission
vulnerabilities.description: When creating QR codes for links, sends user URLs, QR names, and extension ID to third-party shortening services hybridapps.net and amazonspot.net without clear disclosure.

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Cryptographic Credentials
vulnerabilities.description: Embeds secp256k1 private key and API token in plaintext for qrcd.org API authentication.

flags.description: Server-controlled notification system fetches unsigned JSON to display arbitrary content, with time-based evasion filtering (7am-10pm only)
User URLs and QR code data sent to unknown third-party shortening services without disclosure
